showLibrary :: Show a => CombMap a -> String

findCLeafInGrammar :: Grammar -> Comb -> Maybe Comb

Is the combinator leaf in the grammar? If so, return it. Else Nothing.

refreshCombFromGrammar :: Grammar -> Comb -> Maybe Comb

Grab the combinator from the grammar. Useful, to get the original type information.

Returns the number of expansions used in this combinator.

combineGrammars :: (Grammar, Double) -> (Grammar, Double) -> Grammar

Combine two grammars weighted by the number of observations (or pseudo-observations) each has.

calcLogProb :: Grammar -> Type -> Comb -> Double

Returns the log probability of using the given combinator when prompted by the given type, as prescribed by the grammar.
